mapper.insert: insert into T_PROCESS_RESULT ( SETTLE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, RESULT_CODE, RESULT_MSG, TOTAL_NOTES, TOTAL_AMOUNT, INVEST_NOTES, INVEST_AMOUNT, CPU_INVEST_NOTES, CPU_INVEST_AMOUNT, MCARD_INVEST_NOTES, MCARD_INVEST_AMOUNT, CONSUME_NOTES, CONSUME_AMOUNT, CPU_CONSUME_NOTES, CPU_CONSUME_AMOUNT, MCARD_CONSUME_NOTES, MCARD_CONSUME_AMOUNT, CUSTOMER_NOTES, CUSTOMER_AMOUNT, CPU_CUSTOMER_NOTES, CPU_CUSTOMER_AMOUNT, MCARD_CUSTOMER_NOTES, MCARD_CUSTOMER_AMOUNT, REVISE_NOTES, REVISE_AMOUNT, CPU_REVISE_NOTES, CPU_REVISE_AMOUNT, MCARD_REVISE_NOTES, MCARD_REVISE_AMOUNT ) values ( #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{investNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{investAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuInvestNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardInvestNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{consumeNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{consumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuConsumeNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardConsumeNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuCustomerNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuCustomerAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardCustomerNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardCustomerAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reviseNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reviseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuReviseNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpuReviseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardReviseNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mCardReviseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
